promises.title: End war in Ukraine within 24 hours of being elected
promises.description: Trump claimed he would end the war in Ukraine in 24 hours if he won.
promises.status_info: This promise was marked as broken because it was not fulfilled within 24 hours. It will be marked as compromised when it is executed.

promises.title: Withdraw from the Paris climate agreement
promises.description: Trump promises to pull out of the climate agreement and claw back any unspent or unallocated money.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Laura Trump - Trump is not associated with and doesn't support Project 2025.
promises.description: Laura Trump is saying that Trump doesn't know anything about project 2025 and that he does not support and find many things 'really frightening' about the plan.  Claims associations with Trump and Trumps platform with project 2025 are hoaxes and misinformation.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Robert F. Kennedy Jr - Trump asked him to do three things health related
promises.description: Clean up corruption in government health agencies, return those agencies to their rich tradition of gold-standard and evidence based science, and make America healthy again by ending the chronic disease epidemic.

promises.title: Jim Jordan - Trump will not carry out threats to go after political rivals
promises.description: Trump has repeatedly threatened to carry out various actions against his political rivals and democrats in general.  Jim Jordan has denied this will occur.

promises.title: Trump won't end the Affordable Care Act
promises.description: Trump posted to Twitter that he will not end the Affordable Care Act when he was accused of intending to do that.

promises.title: Fire Gary Gensler on Day 1
promises.description: Trump pledged to fire Gary Gensler on day 1 of his administration during the Bitcoin 2024 conference.

promises.title: Trump will not try to fire Jerome Powell
promises.description: Trump stated in an interview he would not attempt to fire the Chairman of the Federal Reserve Jerome Powell.

promises.title: JD Vance - Trump will not hire neocons who refused to enforce Trump's troop withdrawal from Syria
promises.description: Vance said that they will not hire and fire anyone who didn't support the withdrawal from Syria.
promises.status_info: We have identified Marco Rubio, Elise Stefanik, John Thune, and Lee Zeldin as being evidence against this promise and marking it broken.

promises.title: End birthright citizenship for undocumented immigrants' babies
promises.description: Will sign an executive order on day 1 that future children of illegal immigrants will not be citizens of the United States of America.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.

promises.title: Restore and expand the Trump travel ban
promises.description: Trump indicated he would restore and expand the Trump travel ban on Day 1.

promises.title: Suspend refugee resettlement immediately
promises.description: Stop all migrate flights, end all illegal entries, terminate the phone app CBP One, revoke deportation immunity, suspend refugee resettlement, and return all migrants to their home countries.
promises.status_info: No information on this promise yet.
